website_summaries.verdict: Notably, these shoe bags typically hold either one men's shoe or a pair of women's shoes.
pros: Made of lightweight nylon fabric with zippers
Material is stiffer than that of other brands, which some people may prefer
These bags expand quite a bit
cons: Zippers get caught in the fabric relatively easily
Not necessarily a good choice for storing boots

customer_reviews.title: Great light shoe bags for traveling
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! It's very light and does a perfect job of packing shoes and keeping everything else clean. The bags expand quite a bit. I was able to fit 4 pairs of flipflops (2 adults 2 kids) in 1 bag, a pair of men's running shoes in another, and a pair of women's hiking boots in a 3rd bag. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Classy shoe bag or anything bag!
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice! In the past, I would put my shoes in a plastic grocery bag before putting them in my luggage. (Tacky but practical and certainly not waterproof). I like the various colors of these travel shoe bags. I wear a women's size 10 and my shoes fit nicely with room to spare. I can't wait to go on my trip and test the waterproofness. I'm ordering another set to use for other items.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonCountess

customer_reviews.title: Fits a pair of size 13 trail runners
customer_reviews.text: One of my ongoing travel issues is that I need to come home with a pair of muddy or dusty trail runners, and it's just not practical to clean them thoroughly in a hotel bathroom. I actually can get a pair of size 13's into these bags, although it's a tight fit and I presume I'll eventually damage the zipper. I wish they were a couple of inches larger, but they do work. If the vendor were to make an extra large size I would certainly buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase. The colors help you find the shoes you want in your luggage quickly!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for packing shoes, as noted in the item name but I also love them for taking a whole outfit in an airplane carry on bag. If you travel a lot for work like I do and need to do a quick change in the airport bathroom from nicer clothes into something comfy, the hooks on these are super helpful for hanging on the bathroom door while you get ready for your flight -- or get ready for your meeting post-flight!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Sanfilippo

customer_reviews.title: Tight to get them in and zipped, but then fine. They are NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: They just barely fit size 11.5 men's Asics running shoes. Tight to get them in and zipped but then fine. They are NOT waterproof. I had cereal in a container, wrapped in a plastic bag, and then placed in one of these nylon shoe bags. The milk leaked through all of them. Better than nothing but not waterproof. Four cheap bags for organizing, nothing more. Update: 9/6/2016: The Misslo company monitors these reviews and contacted me regarding this problem. The customer service section was very responsive and very helpful. Customer service provided a replacement bag that is of higher quality. The customer service has been exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Ax Chase

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for price, could have better zippers
customer_reviews.text: Over all a decent product.I love that they expand and i can fit my size 10 women's heveay winter boots in here. Zippers were sub par and didn't like how cheap they sound and feel zipping up and down. I have bought things with better zippers from the dollar store. These were useful to keep shoes and dirty underwear seperate for the rest of the clothes. Overall not a bad product for price but per item. They have lasted me two trips so far and have not come undone and no zippers busted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for traveling - can double as toiletry bags too!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely fabulous for traveling. Before these, I used to wrap each shoe individually in a grocery bag, the ones with heels always poked thru, which drove me crazy, cuz I didn't want my shoes touching my clean clothes, so I would end up double bagging each shoe. Now I don't have to! I wear a size 10 women's and my hubby wears a size 10 men's, and both our shoes fit in the bags just fine. These can double as toiletry bags too, very versatile. Great buy, and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: AshKum

customer_reviews.title: Fair for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These shoe bags are very roomy, and I've also found them convenient for stowing other items. So far they've held up well for traveling, the only reason I didn't give them a five star rating is because the seams aren't finished, consequently there's a problem with loose threads that can be caught in the zipper. Of course the threads can be clipped, but because of this, their lifetime will be shortened. Still, for the price, I feel they're a fair purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Great for cruises and travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put my dress shoes away for a cruise and I was only able to use two of the bags because my wife stole the other two bags. She loves them and she was able to pack away two pairs of heels in each bag! I was also happy that they protected my dress shoes and I was able to pack them with out getting the soles of my shoes on my freshly packed clothes. I do not like my shoes touching my clothes. I am a bit odd that way. I did like the bags and they appear to be made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag for my bike shoes
customer_reviews.text: So, we have an underground bike parking in our garage at our complex. It's great but I hate lugging my bike shoes down to put it on there. This bag is fantastic at storing so I can lug it around up and down to the garage. I was worried that the bag may be too small or too right to fit the shoes but as you can see in the picture, it's a perfect size. I only recently started to use so I can't speak for the durability but since it was 4-pack, even if one doesn't late a long time, I can use others.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Park

customer_reviews.title: Good for keeping dirty shoes separate from clothes in your luggage. Not water resistant though.
customer_reviews.text: These shoe bags worked great for me. They don’t really fit men’s shoes very well though, even though they claim they do. I used 2 bags for a recent trip and gave the other 2 to my husband. He wears a size 11.5 size shoe and he did get them in the bag but, he had to turn them sideways to get them in. They are not water resistant at all! I sprinkled water on the bags to test them out and it soaked right into the material. I still like them for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel or the Gym!
customer_reviews.text: Must for travelers who don't like a messy travel bag. Used three of the bags for dress and workout shoes. Used the forth to put a small travel kit and other bathroom accessories. Another great use is for gym bag. My current gym bag has a place for shoes which I put my weight lifting shoes. Since getting these bags I have been adding a cross trainer and running shoes inside the bag so I am always prepared for my Crossfit workout. Just don't share them because you are going to wish you had all four bags :).
customer_reviews.author: TheIntendedLife

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for travel!
customer_reviews.text: These are such great shoe bags! We needed something that would fit my husband's size 11.5-12 US shoes when we travel. These are simple in construction, but work really well to protect other things in the luggage from dirty shoes. They also wipe clean easily, and I love that they fold flat when you store them. I've used one of the bags myself to store 4 pairs of flat sandals & flip flops (US W 6) on a trip, and was really happy with how it kept them away from my clothes. We are ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Spoon

customer_reviews.title: Size 11 Running Shoes Do Not Fit
customer_reviews.text: Good luck trying to get a size 11 pair of Hoka running shoes in these bags without a handful of vaseline. Also, the material is paper thin and looks like it may hold up for about 3 or 4 trips. If you are a road warrior, you might want to look for something a bit more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tropical

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Shoe Protectors
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these for my husband and I for traveling. Sorry I did not think of these before, but it makes it so much nicer to put your shoes in a lightweight bag to keep them away from your clothes and to keep them together. I highly recommend these. I have only used them for one trip so I don't know how they will hold up long term, but for now they seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K

customer_reviews.title: Fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy show bags that contain men's shoes. I shine my own shoes, and they are all leather, so it is nice to have a bag to keep them in for short trips or longer term storage in the closet. These are not fancy but they definitely do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie V

customer_reviews.title: Help to organize travel
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for organizing clothes and other personal effects when traveling. A bag is large enough to hold several shirts or a couple of pairs of pants. Also the different colors help you keep track of different items. The zippers seems to be good quality. This is one of those things that I wish I’d discovered years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Tori P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for what I was looking for. Exactly what I needed and at a great price. They fit standard sized sneakers and sandals perfectly and I like the multi colors that help me keep organized. I love using these for travel to keep my clothes as clean as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Kay678

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I got these to hold a pair of tennis shoes and a pair of flip flops for my size seven feet. They work perfectly for my use. I like them because they are a densely woven nylon keeping shoe dirt away from my clean clothes in my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Kadee Shore

customer_reviews.title: WORKS SO WELL FOR SHOES-TRAVEL
customer_reviews.text: These worked so well on my last vacation that I was saying to myself; "why didn't I have these years earlier". So nice to zip your shoes up and not worry about them getting your other clothes in the suitcase dirty. Just toss them in and go. It works so much better than using grocery bags. We carry a couple of them in the car now to stick water shoes flip-flops & other things that we don't want to get the car dirty. I wash mine in the washing machine whenever it's needed. They seem like they are fairly good quality and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've been missing!
customer_reviews.text: They work great! They're adequately sized. Lightweight, colorful, waterproof! Good for more than just shoes: wet bathing suits, dirty duds, shampoo bottle, lotion, or anything you want to separate to protect your clothes. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Great for everything from boots to belts
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these on multiple trips in the past few months and they have become indispensable! I can fit a pair of small men’s boots in these with no issue, and they work for other bits and bobs as well that you want to keep separate. I’ve also doubled up on pairs of flat shoes (men’s and women’s) when necessary with no problems. Multiple colors are great for differentiating my shoes from my partner’s.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Handy shoe bags
customer_reviews.text: This review is for Misslo Portable Nylon Travel bags, black with zipper. This came as a 4 pack. I needed to pack multiple pairs of shoes for previous trips and was excited to have these for my most recent trip. Shoes stayed organized and neat. We used to use plastic bags, but this was a more environmentally friendly option. Easy to rinse/ wipe and air out after being used. May be buying more in the future if I need.
customer_reviews.author: dlzuma

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 4 were decent, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Decent bags, zipper came off the track a couple times on one. Bought these to put wet/muddy race clothes/shoes in to travel back home in my carry on, they served their purpose and washed clean. After 24 hrs they started to get a little wet (it doesn't claim waterproof, just adding) but otherwise they contributed to a flight home without a wet backpack. Washed clean after.
customer_reviews.author: User1

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoebag
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are more than fabulous. I'm a size 9, and I fit a pair of heels, and two pair of flat slides in one bag easily. The bags are lightweight, yet sturdy. The zipper is medium weight and the hanging loop which gives you the option to hang the bag or use the loop as a handle is great. You cannot go wrong with this purchase, especially for the price. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Planning to use as toiletry kit
customer_reviews.text: Planning to use this as a toiletries kit, not as a shoe bag. Appears likely to serve that purpose just fine. And, unless I later find some kind of design or manufacturing flaw, it's a less costly choice than overpriced (and in my opinion, over-"engineered") toiletry bags.
customer_reviews.author: Trollopian

customer_reviews.title: Great packing aid, and reusable!
customer_reviews.text: I take these shoes bags on every trip I go on. I love that they are reusable and can just be washed - I used to just use plastic bags but that felt so wasteful. These are perfect - every pair of shoe I own can fit into these bags except for my biggest boots.
customer_reviews.author: Socotronic

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for traveling and for throwing shoes in my gym bag. These bags are larger than I expected and I can even fit two pairs of some shoes in one bag. They also are thin and fold up small!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my cruise & they worked great. I used all of my bags and I was able to put heels and sandals in each of them. I am a size 6 in shoes. I now use them for my biker boots. I am able to put in there one pair of ankle length boots I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: BonJovi#1

customer_reviews.title: Well-constructed, water resistant shoe bags for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes bags for travel. Well-constructed and water resistant. They easily accommodate my size 10 loafers, oxfords, slip ons and low-top athletic shoes, and are perfect for packing shoes into luggage. Be advised, however, that they will not accommodate my high-top athletic shoes, hiking boots, work boots or dress boots. Nevertheless, an excellent investment for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John Drew

customer_reviews.title: They cover and protect your shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great material, covers and protects my shoes. I normally only use flats and tennis, not sure how it will work with heels. My shoes fit a little lose inside, but since it's made standard, I guess that's the way they need to be. Like that it has a little loop so I can hang them in the closet when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Chinex

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable bag.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my dance shoes and for athletic and other shoes. It is a great way to organize things. I will store my baseball spikes in one of these to keep the rest of my bag clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling. Light material. Did not rip. I wear size 8 women's. Shoes fit and still has extra space. Was able to fit 4 pairs of sandals no problem. You can use for other things too, not just shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these things!
customer_reviews.text: I do not travel without these. I put my toiletries in them and double bag them. They do the job perfectly, hold a ton of items and no leaks in my suitcase. I have never used them for shoes lol.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for transporting hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for storing and transporting hiking boots. They fit perfectly and the handle on top is great for storage, too. Helps keep the dirt from shoes from getting elsewhere in your car, house, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Holly M. Saraniti

customer_reviews.title: Great for gym bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for when I play volleyball/basketball at the gym. I like to keep my shoes as clean as possible, but also I want to keep them separate from the rest of my stuff. I live in Tokyo where I'm always commuting by foot so I have to carry everything in my bag including my books, laptop, and clothes. These are great and fit all shapes and sizes of shoes. I'm able to fit high-top basketball shoes with ease. Definitely worth the purchase especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misslo Shoe Bag
customer_reviews.text: I received my product on the date that the company said it was going to be delivered at my home, and the quality of the bag is excellent I have been looking for a travel bag to put my shoes and sandals when I can't have come to a better website like Amazon to purchase this item and it is roomy and the material of the bags is great. Thanks for having me for a customer I look forward to ordering more items on Amazon. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to travel with
customer_reviews.text: Shoe bags have made it much easier to pack my suitcase. They have withstood a year of travel 3x per month. I have no problem with men’s size 11. Not for boots though.
customer_reviews.author: Brian15

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel!
customer_reviews.text: These keep my shoes and sometimes other parts of my wardrobe safe and dry, and if the shoes are smelly keeps the smell in without permeating the bag
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Barely fit one of my shoes, let alone both ...
customer_reviews.text: Barely fit one of my shoes, let alone both. I'm a size 13 so I would say any shoe size over 10 or 11 may struggle with getting both shoes to fit. At size 13 I could barely get both my sneakers to fit. So if you have dress shoes, which tend to be bigger, no way you are getting both in the same bag. Sadly these are the exact kinds of shoes you buy protective bags for (dress shoes).
customer_reviews.author: PETE

customer_reviews.title: Versatile | Well-made | Best travel kit | Value for money's worth
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best items I have bought on Amazon. The shoes are easy to carry in these bags anywhere and everywhere. I use them to carry my shoes at the gym, for short weekend getaway trips and long trips. I found them most useful for hiking. The bags are so huge that they can easily fit in hiking boots without force. Great value for the Price!
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: These shoe bags served it's purpose for our travels. ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoe bags served it's purpose for our travels. My family each had their own color bag. It's light weight. Hubby was able to fit 1 pair of shoes as i was able to squeeze 2 pairs. My toddlers were able to fit 3 pairs since they do have little feet. I'd need to use these more often to know their durability.
customer_reviews.author: MVB

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe Bags
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's size 7.5 and was able to put a pair of shoes and a pair of sandals in each bag. Love these bags because they keep my dirty shoes away from all the clean stuff in my suitcase and helps to keep everything organized. I no longer need to use plastic grocery store bags or extra large ziplock baggies!
customer_reviews.author: Mikmity

customer_reviews.title: I love the MISSLO shoe bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love the MISSLO shoe bags! They are well made, high-quality, and well worth the price! I carry my shoes back and forth to work everyday, and have actually had two people at work ask me where I got the shoe bag! Thanks for a great product. Do you make MISSLO clothing bags, too?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet! Love how it is water resistant
customer_reviews.text: I personally was able to customize the shoe bags for my small business and they turned out amazing. I will totally order again. I love how it is water resistant. I am satisfied with my order. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: What’s the point?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t get the point. This literally serves no purpose. I found myself doing a better job packing without them. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Metuka

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Nice way to keep clothes protected from your shoes and much better style than using a plastic shopping bag :)
customer_reviews.author: Fatchihuahua

customer_reviews.title: Quality material
customer_reviews.text: Only used a couple of times and no problems yet. No tears or stuck zipper. Keeps my dirty shoes away from other things in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hng

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe bags!!
customer_reviews.text: We like these shoe bags so much, we ordered a second set. Perfect for taking your shoes to the gym, bringing your hiking shoes in the car, and packing extra shoes in luggage. The construction is roomy, so my running shoes, as well as my hiking sandals, as well as my dress shoes all fit; the zips are smooth and strong; and the loop at the top is perfect for carrying the bag on it's own or hanging it on a hook in the gym or locker. I visited the beach recently and needed to wash out the sand, and the bag came quickly clean with a hand rinse and dried very fast. Great shoe bags!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had these brought to Maldives from the US and I am surely not dissappointed, they occupied quite well my large Timberland shoes and fit everything else almost perfectly. I will be traveling to Europe of a 2 week trip and I hope to be using these to keep my shoes well kept and clean. I will definitely update again after my trip. Afterwards I plan to use them for storage to keep my shoes away from dust.
customer_reviews.author: Shimas

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be good
customer_reviews.text: We got them for an upcoming trip so I cannot say how good they are but coming out of the package they seem fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Good colors, nicely made, did the job. No complaints whatsoever. I may purchase more. I like putting different shoes in different colored bags. Perfect for keeping shoes from getting clothes dirty in duffel bags, suitcases. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Thyme Basil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping shoes from soiling my packed clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a men’s size 10 shoes. It works great. I bought 4 ; one for my wife and myself. The other 2 I gave to some friends.
customer_reviews.author: W. L. Ridgwell

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously small!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are way too small. They’re described as capable to hold a par of size 13 shoes. As you can see in the picture, they barely fit *one* size 11.5 shoe. An absolute sham.
customer_reviews.author: SCC

customer_reviews.title: Well made and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great way to pack shoes. Well made and large enough for my size 11 men’s shoes. I’d recommend these to other travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Love the Nylon bags. Large enough.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I will order these again. They are nylon and large enough for my husbands shoes and my high heal shoes! I wear women’s size 9 he wears men’s 10 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Dalevic

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly roomy
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly roomy little shoe bags! Took these on a camping trip and wanted to minimize space in my pack. I got three pairs of women's size 7 shoes in one bag: sneakers, hiking sandals and flip flops. The package I ordered contained four of these bags, so the rest turned out to be a bonus. The material seems sturdy and water resistant, but I haven't tested this yet. I plan to put my muddy shoes in here to keep the rest of my stuff clean, and I feel pretty sure that the material they are made of will hold up to that. Not fancy by a long shot but will do the trick and a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive travel necessity
customer_reviews.text: If you’re not using shoe bags in your suitcase, you’re doing it wrong. Grab these and clean up your travel act. Well made, simple and lightweight protection.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: My daughter says they work great
customer_reviews.text: I haven't use them yet i have a family vacation coming up soon i will let you know than my daughter an my son in law went on a cruise a few years ago an they bought some they said that it's the best things to have for traveling because they gives you a lot more space
customer_reviews.author: Alice Jones

customer_reviews.title: These travel shoe bags are great. The material is light but very durable and ...
customer_reviews.text: These travel shoe bags are great. The material is light but very durable and fits any kind of shoes. I just traveled and packed a pair of wedges which fit perfectly, a pair of sneakers and 2 pairs of sandals. I'm a size 10 and they fit in the bag just fine. Keeps my dirty shoes away from everything clean in my luggage. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Cheka Handal

customer_reviews.title: Keeps dirty shoes away from clothes.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe organizers are awesome. Not only do they keep the dirt from your shoes away from your clothes, they keep your shoes together. On a very long trip this is very important If you buy the clothes organizers everything stays neat and tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great product: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Great product: Simple, cheap, effective! Packing for travel means curbing my obsessive compulsive need to separate my 'dirty' shoes from my clean, newly washed clothing. Sometimes I would bare with the issue, sometimes I'd have to grab a grocery bag for my shoes. This would then create the problem where I'd be fumbling with the bag as I try to keep the open end from 'contaminating' my suitcase. Now with these bags, I simply zip up my shoes without worry.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrius V

customer_reviews.title: Great for packing shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Makes it so easy to pack shoes now. Very spacious. My heels even fit in them. I wear a size 7 so don’t have a really large foot but they have lots of extra room.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Self

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase
customer_reviews.text: I used these bags when we evacuated Myrtle Beach, SC because of Hurricane Mathew. I placed my 11W shoes side by side and still had space for items such as socks. I love the various colors because I could know which bag had my dress shoes, sneakers, or loafers in without having to search each one. These bags should make my Chinese Mother-in-Law happy with me because she has a pet peeve about shoes being in luggage with clean clothes. I recommend these 100%. They are GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I fit a couple pairs of shoes in each, and one bag can definitely accommodate more if you're dealing with sandals. Not necessarily a travel essential, but simply provides a way to keep shoes separated from the rest of your travel gear. Light and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: Really like these so far. Not great for space but like having to separate shoes from clothes and other belongings
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Cashwell

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERSATILE!
customer_reviews.text: Used for traveling - but also or storing shoes and other items I don't use often. You will find many uses for these bags! Good quality, size is great. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great traveling shoe bags or dirty laundry bags
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to keep my shoes in my suitcase so my clothes don't get dirty. They work great Nice zippers like the quality no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jmeil

customer_reviews.title: is good
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good travel shoe bags, I really like it, but it’s not fit for boots. Update info: There is Cotton one is this store, is soft, super light and big enough. Recommend to people who need big bags for shoes or boots.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Lu

customer_reviews.title: very practical.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I had a more expencive bag before, but I prefere the practicality of this one. Much more convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for travel and I assigned a color to each member in the family. The bags helped keep shoes & socks organized on an international trip. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fits my sneakers I will be taking to Europe. At first it looks like it won’t fit but they expand and it worked out great. The nylon material seems waterproof but I will be traveling in May and will update on the results.
customer_reviews.author: Lilian

customer_reviews.title: Fits size 10 mens
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my partner so that he can store his running shoes when going to the gym. He wears a size 10 and I was worried that they wouldn't fit, but they did! So for those wondering if they fit a size 10 mens...yes they will!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality travel shoe bags
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe bags. They feel well made and it keeps me from using old plastic grocery bags. haha We use them all the time for trips now.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made Zippers...Updated Review - Excellent Customer Service and Satisfaction with New Product
customer_reviews.text: These are not well made. The zippers broke and came off track after very light use. I would not recommend. After posting the above review, I was contacted by the company and they sent me new and improved product similar to this. It is excellent and well made. They made some nice improvements. The company really made great efforts to provide a good customer experience and to be satisfied with their product. I would recommend this company because they support what they sell.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Practical Shoe Travel Bags.
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight set of bags for organizing shoes for travel. I like the variety of colors, so I can remember which shoes I had in which bag----unlike the grocery store plastic bags I previously used for packing to protect my clothing from dirty shoes. I was able to pack 2 pair of sandals into one bag on the last trip.
customer_reviews.author: Anita--AZ

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, well made and much larger in size than other brands. Plenty big! A pair of my size 7 women's hiking boots can fit in one shoe bag, but I don't want to over use the bag. It is an easy fit for a pair of my shoes or 2 pair of sandals. The best use I have is using one of the bags as a less than obvious container in my suitcase. One of the bags isa match for the lining.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Penny

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these and my husband initially thought they were silly, but he keeps borrowing them from me, so I believe he's learned to like them! Keeps my shoes from getting the rest of the stuff in my luggage dirty, so they definitely serve their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Jo Perry

customer_reviews.title: So helpful!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this! Got tired of packing dirty shoes with clothing and this set is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mel O

customer_reviews.title: Great for my shoes and other items!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for shoes and for sport coats! Yes my sport coat folded nicely and fit. Wasn’t planning on using it for this purpose but I only needed two travel bags and found this worked very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Great product, light
customer_reviews.text: Great product, light, easy to distinguish different bags with different things in them (I don't just use them for shoes!!) Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: H. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great size, very helpful for organizing family shoes for a week's vacation
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I packed one per member of the family for a week's vacation in Florida... a pair of adult sneakers, flip-flops and sandals fit into one. My only wish is that they came in different colors, so that I could easily tell one from the other (which I could solve by adding a colored string or tape or something). They kept my suitcase and other clothes from getting dirty, and kept the shoes all organized.
customer_reviews.author: Fan of Gjirokaster

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and Multi functional
customer_reviews.text: I used these on a recent 14 day trip. I was able to put all of my sandals in 1 bag, my sneakers in another, and 2 pair of ballet flats in another, which left me 1 bag which I used to store underwear and bras on the way out, and damp bathing suits on the way back. I'm also using the bags to keep my sneakers separated from my clothes in my gym bag. Great value, quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Christy L

customer_reviews.title: They were very pleased and satisfied with the gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter and husband who are planning a trip to Europe. They were very pleased and satisfied with the gift. The order was handled very smoothly and arrived promptly. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: kat5atems

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately they were cheap enough that I don't mind that ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not impressed with the durability. I use these everyday in my gym bag, but the daily opening and closing and putting them in and out of my bag wears them down in about two months. Fortunately they were cheap enough that I don't mind that much, but when I've used the last one I'm not going to reorder these.
customer_reviews.author: HandyDan

customer_reviews.title: Shoe travel bags work great!
customer_reviews.text: If you travel and want to separate your shoes from your clothes, you will love these bags. They are roomy, well made and the zipper works smoothly. You get a set of four. I like knowing my shoes are organized and they won't be getting dirt on clean clothes in my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerdolly

customer_reviews.title: Organize everything!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I put shoes in them and also pack my clothes in them. My size six shoes fit in the bag. Also, my partner’s size 11.5 men shoes fit in the bag perfectly. I think the bags can hold up to a size 12 men’s shoe—any bigger and they will not fit. The bags keep my dirty shoes from touching other things.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: These are a winner!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoe bags! They're a little over-sized (which is great), and I'm even able to store 2 pairs of sandals together in one bag. Much nicer to keep shoes in these than in my normal grocery store vegetable bags while traveling, and I like the little loops they've built in to hang on things.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay for normal sized shoes but not the wide or long ones; Nice colors and well designed product
customer_reviews.text: Great colors and nicely designed bags to hold shoes. If you happen to have a wide or long sneaker, then you can fit only one per bag. That is the only disappointment. It may work well for women's shoes though
customer_reviews.author: SreeK

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast and AMAZING price for four shoe bags
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and AMAZING price for four shoe bags. I use them for ultimate frisbee. I use one for my cleats, one for my dirty clothes, and one for my clean clothes. And they barely take up any space at all, which is great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ulman

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Great idea extremely too small i wear size 11.5 and could barley get one shoe in without ripping. After contacting the seller he was very apologetic and refunded my item after j purchased the larger cotton ones. These are better quality than the dust bags that come with Gucci Bally and other high end shoes. Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Cigar Guy

customer_reviews.title: its not bad
customer_reviews.text: its nat bad product! But try different products if you can
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: They've got sufficient room for even large shoes, close well. Haven't had them long enough to address durability, nor have I checked out water resistance, but they look good on both fronts.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good bags. Does it job well.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to originally put in 4 stars, but then combined with the price I feel this is worthy of 5 stars. It's a thin nylon bag that you can put your shoes into. I've traveled with it and use them to store my dress shoes in. It does the job. I did get some water on the outside of the bag, and sure enough, no water seeped though onto my shoes. My only gripe is that I wish the bag was slightly more thick. It feels like after heavy use, it would wear thin. But I'm not using these too heavily.
customer_reviews.author: J_R_A

customer_reviews.title: Fits all types of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. Just ordered another set. They fit all types of shoes fro my chunky crocs to my tennis shoes and flip flops. It allows me to put my shoes in my clothing bag without getting my clothes dirty.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: My purchase of Misslo Portable Nylon Travel Shoe Bags
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these travel shoe bags for an upcoming cruise. I am so pleased with them, they are roomy and it fit (with room to spare) my ankle boots, sandals, sneakers and evening shoes. The zipper enclosure and handle make for easy access and the price is good too. I would definitely recommend this to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take my shoes to the gym and for when I travel, to avoid using plastic bags. I am a size 10 1/2 women's shoes, the fit heels also. Great product, looks durable.
customer_reviews.author: LRLB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy, durable, good quality & lightweight so they’re great for keeping shoes clean & organized while packed in luggage or stored at home. I love the fact it has a loop/handle for easy grabbing & which helps to easily zip up.
customer_reviews.author: IAB

customer_reviews.title: Great solid shoe bag
customer_reviews.text: These shoe bags were the perfect fit for my dress shoes when I was recently traveling. They’re smooth material made it extra easy to slide them in and out of my carry on. I’ve used other shoe bags with draw strings and these were just all around far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Steve V

customer_reviews.title: The bags are fine, but I don't foresee them lasting more than ...
customer_reviews.text: The bags are fine, but I don't foresee them lasting more than a few uses. The zippers are difficult to maneuver and get caught id the thin material. My daughter packed her shoes in shower caps that she bought for $1.00. There were a dozen in the package. They worked just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Sandy

product_meta.title: MISSLO Portable Nylon Travel Shoe Bags with Zipper Closure (Pack 4, Black)
feature_bullets: 4 PCS travel bags, one bag large enough to fits size 13 men's Loafers/size 11 men's hiking boots(one mid-height boot per bag)/size 11 tennis shoes/ size 14 flip flops, Size 9 women's high heels;
Made of tear resistant Nylon, more durable than other Non-Woven, also with upgraded zippers which zip up smoothly and protect your items dust free in trip, gym or closet;
The lightweight shoe storage bag great for traveling and home use, keeps your shoes separate from clothes and protects it against scuffs and scraps;
15.74"L x 9.4"W x 4.7"H dust bags ideal for packing dance shoes, kids shoes, flip flops, sneakers, golf shoes, works as travel organizer in your luggage or suitcase;
Also be used as makeup bag, toiletries bag，travel laundry bag and other travel accessories bag; Backed by Misslo 1-year limited service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,522 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
